CustomField.description: GeoResults defined alpha code that describes the range of Family Total Sales for the Family ID associated with this business. "A = Under $500 M B = $500 M to $999.9 M C = $1 MM to $4.9 MM D = $5 MM to $9.9 MM F = $10 MM to $24.9 MM G = $25 MM to $74.9 MM H = $75 MM to $199.9 MM I = $200 MM to $499.9 MM J = $500 MM to $999.9 MM K = $1 Billion + U = Unknown"
CustomField.label: Family Total Sales Size Code
